title:
Logarithmic Refinements of a Power Weighted Hardy--Rellich-Type
  Inequality
authors: Fritz Gesztesy, Michael M. H. Pang, and Jonathan Stanfill
abstract:
The principal purpose of this note is to prove a logarithmic refinement of
the power weighted Hardy--Rellich inequality on $n$-dimensional balls, valid
for the largest variety of underlying parameters and for all dimensions $n \in
\mathbb{N}$, $n\geq 2$.
